channel.title: Where do i need to put the cache?
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm very new to rsps developing. I was wondering, where do i put the cache? I know it's somewhere in the client folder, but where?
Thanks

item.title: Where do i need to put the cache?
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Thank you very much!
If you want, could we add eachother on skype? If i can’t figure something out you could help me.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i need to put the cache?

item.title: Where do i need to put the cache?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Where the cache goes changes per client.

Open up the signlink.java (In the sign folder usually), and search for “findcachedir” you should get a couple results, but the second one is what we want.

It’ll return a string that tells you where the cache goes. If it says “user.home”, then the cache goes in C:\Users\YourUsername\CacheHere on a windows 7 pc.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i need to put the cache?
